official_title: A bill to amend the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933 to provide that a Federal savings and loan association may not offer a mortgage with a variable interest rate to any person unless such association also offers such person a mortgage with a fixed interest rate.

summary.text: Amends the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933 to require any Federal savings and loan association which offers a person a mortgage with a variable interest rate to offer such person a 25-year mortgage with an interest rate fixed at the initial rate of the variable rate mortgage.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933 to provide that a Federal savings and loan association may not offer a mortgage with a variable interest rate to any person unless such association also offers such person a mortgage with a fixed interest rate.
